name: Don't Panic! Corona-Virus
description:
Play in your browser on the PC.

Don't Panic. Defend yourself against the corona-virus with your skill and wit. With only one form of defence, your immune response system. Stay Safe.

Upgrades available up to level 150.  

Automatic save feature.

Controls: 

Use the LMB, or just press Space Bar.

If something breaks then just press R on your keyboard to reset the game. 

Get the best experience by downloading the game.

I most likely will continue work on this and turn it into a hyper-casual game for mobile.
